name: Xenocavern
description:
🎮 This game has controller support! 

Xenocavern is a futuristic roguelike game with a unique arsenal and a variety of areas and enemies to discover.  Dethrone the Alien Tyrant and take control of this dominated xenoplanet!

"Space Boss Battle Theme" by Matthew Pablo
"Mystical Theme" by Alexandr Zhelanov
"Tragic ambient main menu" by brandon75689
"Crystal Cave" by cynicmusic
"Background space track" by yd
"Through space" by maxstack
"Orchestral Battle Music" by Zef

gamepad.js API by Neogeek

Additional sound effects by Julius Galla
